>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

You’ve learned to keep your nanites functioning even when they’re separated by currents or environmental factors. Your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KOxmSWm5D1jHy8VU]{cloud array} can have a gap of one 5-foot square between the spaces it fills. At 10th level, this increases to two 5-foot squares, and at 18th level, this increases to three 5-foot squares. Even if split into multiple smaller clouds by these gaps, the cloud functions as one unit. When reconfiguring the spaces your cloud occupies, at least one square of each smaller cloud must remain unchanged.
